title: Histopathologic assessment of depth of follicular invasion of squamous cell carcinoma (SCC) in situ (SCCis): Implications for treatment approach.
venue: Journal of American Academy of Dermatology

tldr.text: Although SCCis invasion of the upper hair follicle infundibulum is common, deep invasion below the level of the surrounding epidermis is rare, which may have implications for optimal therapy of this condition.
